title: sources
extract: any thing or place from which something comes, arises, or is obtained; origin: Which foods are sources of calcium? the beginning or place of origin of a stream or river. a book, statement, person, etc., supplying information.
extract_html: any thing or place from which something comes, arises, or is obtained; origin: Which foods are sources of calcium? the beginning or place of origin of a stream or river. a book, statement, person, etc., supplying information.
